Text:
The quality isn't too bad but as you can see by reading the file information above the aspect ratio is wrong. If you want it to display correctly you'll need to be able to correct it to display with a 16:9 aspect ratio on playback.

There's also large parts which are in Spanish, as well as large parts in English, but there's no subtitles for either so unless you speak both languages.....
I tried to find some subtitles but so far haven't found any which sync with this AVI correctly, and most of them aren't exactly "word perfect" anyway.
